text: Arau yisakale allaha arau te'omra raachulara prati imana ane, te'omloke'i nija pratipalakara ocarata chiddikba arau sbahida (buli bibecita). Te'omlokara babe ache te'omlokara praapya puraskara arau nura; arau yisakale kupharai karaiche arau amara nidarsanasamuha asbikara karaiche, sihamte'i jahannamara adhibasi
